## First order univariate derivatives

```{r}
# Problem A
f_x = expression(x^2)

df_dx = D(expr = f_x, "x")

df_dx

x = 3

eval(expr = df_dx)

```

```{r}
# Problem B

p_a = expression(2*(3*a+2)^4-5)

df_da = D(expr = p_a, "a")

df_da 

a = 1.2

eval(expr = df_da)

```

```{r}
# Problem C 

g_t = expression((-4*t)/((t^2+1)^3))

gf_gt = D(expr = g_t, "t")

gf_gt

t = 0

eval(expr = gf_gt)

```
